channel.title: Ping Everything Everywhere All At Once on Ping Everything Everywhere All At Once - Get Uptime As An API Service
channel.description: Recent content in Ping Everything Everywhere All At Once on Ping Everything Everywhere All At Once - Get Uptime As An API Service

item.title: Supported Servers
item.description: Singapore New York, US Amsterdam, Netherlands and many more to come

item.title: Usage
item.description: To use, you will need to make an API call to our API server and specify a target you want to ping and an optional locations to set where the servers will be pinging from. curl -X POST \ -H "Authorization: Bearer <token> \ https://api.peeaao.com/ping \ -d target=https://url \ -d locations=singapore \ -d expected_code=301 Parameter Description Optional Single Request target ping target in the format (scheme://address) - X locations Ping from locations (comma-delimited) Yes X expected_code expected http status code (http/https only) - X Available Locations nyc singapore amsterdam âœ’ Single Request In this mode, you will get the ping result in the same request.

item.title: Use Cases
item.description: Using PEEAAO’s API, you can build tools that help track your sites’ uptime and response times. Prometheus & Grafana Using our PEEAAO Prometheus Exporter, you can start to retrieve metrics that you can plug into Grafana.

item.title: Private Beta is Open
item.description: We are currently in private beta. To register your interest, please leave your email at the following link: https://forms.gle/ZkAzxLVnVDftLNLn7
